Germany: King Charles the Simple of Lotharingia was captured in battle by French forces.
France: Battle of Soissons (923): Robert was killed. Charles was captured by Rudolph, the duke of Burgundy.
Rudolph was elected king of France by an assembly of nobles. He left the Duchy of Burgundy to his brother.
China: Prince Li Cunxu of Jin declared himself emperor of Later Tang.
The Later Liang emperor Zhu Youzhen was killed by one of his generals at the approach of Li Cunxu to his capital Daliang.
